Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
This project aims to store beautiful landscape videos from around the world on the Filecoin network, providing global users with high-quality natural scenery video resources, covering landscapes, natural wonders, cityscapes, and more. We will categorize these videos into multiple genres, such as mountains, oceans, forests, deserts, etc., and provide high-definition video files for each category. Storing these videos will help preserve digital assets and ensure that global users can easily access and download these resources.

Store thousands of hours of high-definition landscape videos on the Filecoin network.
Provide video streaming access services, showcasing the world's most beautiful scenery.
Ensure the long-term availability of video content through a decentralized storage system, unaffected by a single server.
Support various use cases, including education, travel, and cultural exchange.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: The data stored in this project mainly consists of high-definition natural landscape video files, covering mountains, oceans, forests, deserts, cityscapes, and more from around the world. Each video is in MP4 format.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: we utilize the  tool `go-graphsplit` developed by the filedrive-team to segment the data into pieces of a specified size.  Additionally, we employ droplet 、venus、lotus and other tools to facilitate data preparation and ensure compatibility with the Filecoin network.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Asia other than Greater China, North America
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: Cloud storage (i.e. S3), IPFS, Shipping hard drives
